title: On the Offensive
description: I always beg for more.I always wake up too soon.I always hate myself for dreaming about him.I always take that hatred out on him…my stepbrother.For New Year’s, Peyton finds herself in Aspen for a vacation with her family instead of hanging out with her college friends back in Florida.While she’s missed her mom, step dad, and little brother, she can’t say that the same for Zack, her older step brother—a man she both hates and desires.
author: Cara Dee
